name: Police station mystery
description:
Police station mystery is a short horror story about the events that took place at the police station. Can you figure out what's wrong here? Explore, investigate and inspect.

Minimal system requirements for stable operation at 75+ fps 

Game only for windows. 

GPU - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080

CPU: Intel Core i5-2400 

RAM: 8 GB RAM

OS: Windows 10 64-bit

Not tested on AMD systems!

Vote for next game
